title: Katachi Amti
description: It is a spicy,tangy maharashtrian gravy served mainly with pooranpoli.
ingredients: The leftover water from boiling the lentils for the pooranpoli filling
instructions: We will create a paste i.e called vatan inmarathi by dry roasting onion,coriander and garlic.
Once the ingredients starts roasting add dry coconut pieces and roast everything together, once roasted make a fine paste.
Add 2 tablespoon oil in a pan and add the paste and fry it till it releases oil
Now add the lal Tikhat or Goda masala and fry that as well.
Once spices release oil add the leftover water from boiling the lentils for the pooranpoli filling. This water is called kat.
Add salt as per the taste and boil it for 5-10 minutes till you can see the oil on the surface of the gravy.
The gravy will be in the liquid consistency and once you see the oil on the surface switch off the flame. Your Katachi Amti is ready.
